channel.title: Coding
channel.description:
I need help with a bit of coding, because it's my first time trying to do it. I want to know how to spawn say a wall and have some npcs arching at the person who runs through the through the two walls, a bit like monkey madness: Npc = @ @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@ ____________________________ ____________________________ @@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@
but i dont know what all the codes mean so anyone help?

item.title: Coding
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Find a ‘Global Object’ tutorial. I don’t know how to make an NPC run at you though.

Read full topic
